User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Heart's Persuasion app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

Proposal.title: Proposal
Proposal.description: Represents a proposal within the Heart's Persuasion app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Proposal entity.

senderId.description: Reference to the User who sent the proposal. (Relationship: User 1:N Proposal)

recipientName.description: Name of the User who received the proposal.

status.description: Status of the proposal (e.g., pending, accepted, rejected).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the proposal was created.

acceptedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the proposal was accepted.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification related to a proposal.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Notification entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who receives the notification. (Relationship: User 1:N Notification)

proposalId.description: Reference to the Proposal the notification is about. (Relationship: Proposal 1:N Notification)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the notification was created.

read.description: Indicates whether the notification has been read or not.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their own profile data.

/users/{userId}/proposals/{proposalId}.description: Stores a private copy of proposals for the logged-in user. Path-based ownership ensures that only the user can access this data.

/proposals/{proposalId}.description: Stores a public-readable copy of the proposal so the recipient can view it without logging in. The security rules prevent listing or deleting.

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: Stores notifications for a specific user. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their notifications.
